parameters.name: layer
parameters.shortdesc: The layer on which to create the GraphicLine.

parameters.name: at
parameters.shortdesc: The location at which to insert the GraphicLine relative to the reference object or within the container object.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the at parameter is before or after. Can accept: Document, Spread, MasterSpread, Page, Layer or PageItem.

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new GraphicLine

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the GraphicLine.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the GraphicLine with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the GraphicLine with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the GraphicLine with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the GraphicLines within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The GraphicLine, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: GraphicLine, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The GraphicLine, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: GraphicLine, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first GraphicLine in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last GraphicLine in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle GraphicLine in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the GraphicLine with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the GraphicLine that follows the desired GraphicLine.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the GraphicLine whose index follows the specified GraphicLine in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The GraphicLine whose index comes before the desired GraphicLine.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any GraphicLine in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every GraphicLine in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the GraphicLine.
Returns the GraphicLine with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
